page.title: 14IRVINE * MY DAY AGE 12
page.content: {Monday_}my alarm awakes me at 7.30am.I get dressed have a breakfast of fruit juice and cereal, then pack my school bag. I leave home at{8.25}to meet my friends and walk to school. School starts at{9.00}and we usually do maths, then have gym.{10.45}and we have a break for 15 minutes. Back in school we work until{12.30,}our lunch break.1.30 we go back into school and work on our topic work (space this term).{3.15}and we finish school. I walk home with my friends and if I have school work to do, I do it then. I also have piano practice to do as I get lessons every Wednesday at school. After that it is teatime.When I have finished my tea I get changed for Guides and pack my bag, then I may play on my computer or watch television. (continued on next page)
